name: Qwerty Words
description:
Qwerty Words is a basic word game that uses your keyboard as the main component. The rule is that you must make a viable word that is made up of letters that are adjacent to one another on the keyboard. Words may use the same letter to create words that have "ee", "oo", "ss", and so forth. There is a total of 101 words currently present. Can you find all of them?

If you find any words that I missed , please do not hesitate to submit your own! But they must follow the rules put forth.

PLEASE do not post any of the words, I wish for other players to try their luck without any "boosts" to assist them.
